title: The Glass Tomb 1955 | John Ireland, Honor Blackman | Full Movie | Subtitles added!

sources.title: The Glass Tomb 1955 | John Ireland, Honor Blackman | Full Movie | Subtitles added!
sources.description:
JAGGED EDGE OF VIOLENCE!...THAT SHATTERS THE SCREEN WITH SUSPENSE!
Crowds flock to a carnival sideshow to see "The Starving Man", a heavyset man who claims he can go 70 days without eating. However, a couple of murders occur at the carnival, resulting in the police becoming involved.

Colorized version https://youtu.be/QGxoja5vNRY

Director: Montgomery Tully
Writers: Richard H. Landau, A.E. Martin (novel "The Outsiders")
Stars: John Ireland, Honor Blackman, Geoffrey Keen

0:00 Full Movie

41:20 üîç A man named Sapolio is hungry and shaves while people write him notes about not being allowed to do so, but he dies of hunger because he believes he needs to be hungry to stay alive. There is mention of someone named Rena Maroni who asked for help finding a job and ended up with Tony Lewis.
